articles.description: Rangers fans have lauded an ex-Rangers star for leaping to the defence of Colombian striker Alfredo Morelos who has been heavilty criticised this week.
articles.content:
Gers fans have lauded ex-Rangers midfielder Derek Ferguson for standing up for striker Alfredo Morelos as the fall-out rumbles on over an incident at Easter Road.

articles.title: FA Cup fifth round TV times confirmed as fixtures move to midweek - Mirror Online
articles.description: Man Utd, Chelsea, Man City and Tottenham will all have their FA Cup fifth round ties televised after the schedule was announced
articles.content:
Eight of the fifth round FA Cup ties will be televised with Manchester United, Chelsea and Manchester City all in action.

articles.author: Theo Squires
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp should break his own transfer rule to solve Liverpool defensive crisis - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: One of Jurgen Klopp's former Dortmund stars is a free agent right now and could be exactly what the manager needs in the short term at Liverpool
articles.content:
Liverpool need a centre-back.
Jurgen Klopp knows it, the fans know it and the media know it. FSG surely know it too.
